Replacing an Old Table Template with a New One

If you have edited an existing table template in an ODF and would like to apply this new template for the same data set, the old table template needs to be deleted from the Tables Values dialog box.

The existing data in that table can be saved and then re-imported (i.e. to prevent you from re-entering the data).

In the Table Values dialog box, select the table where you want to apply a new template for the same data set.

Click Export Rows to Clipboard. This will export your table data to the clipboard temporarily.

Click Delete, then Yes to confirm that the data values on this table will be erased.

Click Create and select the new templates from the Template box. Click Apply.

Click Clipboard from the Load Rows From. This will paste the data exported to clipboard previously.

Note. If the data column number changed on the new template, you may not get your data imported properly when you click Clipboard from the Load Rows From section.
